text: The toad crawled into Rincewind's hand, picked up a pen, and began to think this was a dream.

passages.fragment: The toad crawled into Rincewind 's hand
passages.full_quote: <used>The toad crawled into Rincewind's hand</used> and gave him an apologetic look

passages.fragment: into Rincewind 's hand , picked up a
passages.full_quote: The ape pushed the candlestick <used>into Rincewind's hand, picked up a</used> scalpel and a pair of tweezers, and bent low over the trembling book

passages.fragment: , picked up a pen , and began to
passages.full_quote: Death opened his great ledger, <used>picked up a pen, and began to</used> write

passages.fragment: , and began to think this was a dream
passages.full_quote: Then, too, his brother's former mistress<used>, and began to think this was a dream</used>
